bug.short_desc: zanata-cli is mistakenly go to zanata-platform
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: zanata-cli is mistakenly go to zanata-platform, it should go to zanata-client instead.
So do: /usr/share/java/zanata-platform/zanata-cli.jar /usr/share/maven-poms/zanata-platform/client.pom /usr/share/maven-poms/zanata-platform/zanata-cli.pom
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): zanata-platform-4.1.1-2
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. dnf reqoquery -ql zanata-platform 2. dnf reqoquery -ql zanata-client 3.
Actual results: zanata-platform contains /usr/bin/zanata-cli /usr/share/java/zanata-platform/zanata-cli.jar /usr/share/maven-poms/zanata-platform/client.pom /usr/share/maven-poms/zanata-platform/zanata-cli.pom
Expected results: Above files should go to zanata-client instead
Additional info:
zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-1400c86199
zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2efc03e04e

zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2efc03e04e

zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-1400c86199
zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
zanata-platform-4.1.1-3.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
